wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan Gregory is the Director of Music of the UK-Japan Music Society and UK-Japan Choir, having previously been Director of Music at Leicester Cathedral from 1994 - 2010.

response: *Jonathan Gregory 1994–2010 (previously organist of St Anne's Cathedral, Belfast, now Director of Music of the UK Japan Choir)

*Simon Headley 2010–2018 (also acted as Acting Director of Music in the Autumn of 2010 between the departure of Jonathan Gregory and the appointment of current Director of Music, Christopher Ouvry-Johns)

link_mentions.page: List of musicians at English cathedrals
response: *Jonathan Gregory 1994–2010 (previously organist of St Anne's Cathedral, Belfast, now Director of Music of the UK Japan Choir)
*Simon Headley 1999–2018 (also Acting Director of Music in the Autumn of 2010 between the departure of Jonathan Gregory and the appointment of current Director of Music, Christopher Ouvry-Johns)

* Jonathan Gregory, Director of Music of the UK-Japan Music Society and UK-Japan Choir; Examiner, the Associated Board of the Royal Schools of Music. Previously Organ Scholar, Clare College, Cambridge; Director of Music - Belfast Cathedral 1976–1984; St George's Parish Church, Belfast; Great St Mary's Church, Cambridge; Leicester Cathedral, 1994-2010
